  • Classes in org.jboss.msc.service used by org.jboss.msc.service 
    Class and Description
    CircularDependencyException
    An exception which is thrown when the given service installation introduced dependencies cycle.
    Dependency
    A dependency.
    DependencyFlag
    Dependency flags.
    DuplicateServiceException
    An exception which is thrown when the given service is already registered.
    Service
    Service interface providing both start and stop methods to implementors.
    ServiceBuilder
    A service builder.
    ServiceContext
    A service context can be used to add new tasks, and to create and remove services and registries.
    ServiceController
    A controller for a single service instance.
    ServiceMode
    Service modes.
    ServiceName
    Service name class.
    ServiceNotFoundException
    Exception which is thrown when a required service is not found in the registry.
    ServiceRegistry
    A service registry.
    StartContext
    Service start lifecycle context.
    StopContext
    Service stop lifecycle context.
